issue.subject: New policy file
issue.description:
When we add a new configuration with a link to new policy file, the proxy should be able to create this new file by itself. Indeed, when you create a blank one by hand and you try to add a new policy in de back-end, you have this error :
Fatal error: Call to a member function addChild() on a non-object in D:\Website\joomla_sites\thematiques\sig-pyrenees\administrator\components\com_easysdi_proxy\core\view\proxy.admin.easysdi.html.php on line 1128

journals.notes:
I do not know exactly the origin of the error... but I guess you need to create a new file but not blank -> it needs at least some XML tags to create the first line of the file (see the first tags of an existing and working policy file).

Try this... and let us know.
Yes I copy/paste the sample NewPolicy file and it worked but it should not generate a Fatal error message, this is a bug.
Such problem won't appear anymore as policy content is now stored inside database with V4 and not anymore in XML file...
